name: Wearil Wrangler
description:
Here is Wearil Wrangler, our project for Alberta Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Chain Reaction" and here we have our cute but pesky wearils that have such bad gas that they become explosive. The gas of an explosion causes colour change of neighboring wearils. So try and get them all.

The project was pretty big, and we still have a ways to go, but this ended up being a decent proof of concept!
